text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config": { "created": "20171029115120346", "creator": "JD", "text": "\define jdconf() $:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config \define jdconfont() $:/temp/jd/mob/font/ \define jdconfig(config:"" choice:"") <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="$config$" $value=$choice$/> \end \define jdfont(font-title:"" font-body:"" lineheight:"" font-tab:"" font-button:"") <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(jdconfont)$font-title" text="$font-title$"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(jdconfont)$font-body" text="$font-body$"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(jdconfont)$lineheight" text="$lineheight$"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(jdconfont)$font-tab-button" text="$font-tab$"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(jdconfont)$font-button" text="$font-button$"/> \end \define jdradbut(config:"" choice:"") <$reveal type="match" state="$(jdconf)$##$config$" text="$choice$">
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(jdconf)$##$config$" text="$choice$">
\end

Fonts and heights presets

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> Largest
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> Larger
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> Large
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> Medium
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> Small
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> Smaller
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <> TW5 default
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-title" caption="Title" list-before="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-body"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-body" caption="Body, text buttons" list-after="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-title"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/lineheight" caption="Lineheight"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-tab-button" caption="Tab buttons"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-button" caption="Image buttons"/> <> <> Custom <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##fontsize" text="custom"> Include unit (''px'' or ''em'') when entering custom values <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/temp/jd/mob/font/]!suffix[sitetitle]]">
Element Adjust
<$view field="caption"/> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!title}} field="temp" placeholder={{!!text}} class="texte"/> <$reveal type="match" state=!!temp text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="color:grey; cursor:not-allowed;">✓ <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="color:grey; cursor:not-allowed;">✕ <$reveal type="nomatch" state=!!temp text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!title}} text={{!!temp}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!title}} temp=""/>✓ <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!title}} temp=""/>✕

Search bar

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/jdmobbasic" text="yes"/> <> Simple (list standard search results only)
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/jdmobbasic" text="no"/> <> Combined (list all search results; slow on some devices)
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/jdmobbasic" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/jd/mobbutton/visibility/$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/button/search" text="hide"/> <> Hide (will also hide toggle button)

Choose search button

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/jd/mobbutton/visibility/$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/button/search" text="show"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search" text="hide"/> <> Searchbar toggle
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/jd/mobbutton/visibility/$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/button/search" text="hide"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search" text="show"/> <> <> Button to core search
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/jd/mobbutton/visibility/$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/button/search" text="hide"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search" text="hide"/> <> <> Hide", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171122114700452", "caption": "JD Mob" }, "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/readme": { "created": "20171030143047925", "creator": "JD", "text": "This plugin is incompatible with JD Mob, please don't use them at the same time. This is a mobile layout that applies to narrow screens. It introduces the following: # A Searchbar # A Bottombar containing ''Top Left Bar'', ''Page Control'', ''Mob-only'', and ''Top Right Bar'' buttons (in that order) #** ''Top Left Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopLeftBar'' #** ''Page control'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/PageControls'' #** ''Mob-only'' >> other buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobbutton'' #** ''Top Right Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopRightBar'' #** Buttons you don't want to appear here should be tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobno'' #*** For example, you can use this on page control buttons you want to appear in desktop layout but not in mobile layout //Note:// This layout is tied to the ''Sidebar Breakpoint'' set at ''Control Panel'' >> ''Appearance'' >> ''Theme Tweaks''. This layout is compatible with any core theme as of release date. Project Homepage on Tiddlyspot !! Version History !!! 2017-11-22 Release of version 1.0.0", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/readme", "tags": "", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171122095059930" }, "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config": { "created": "20171109145547252", "creator": "JD", "text": "fontsize: default searchbutton: simple searchbar: yes searchbarchoice: simple", "type": "application/x-tiddler-dictionary", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171122114821583" }, "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/button/search": { "created": "20171110170140186", "creator": "JD", "text": "<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Show searchbar" set="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" setTo="yes"> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Hide searchbar" set="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/button/search", "tags": "$:/tags/jd/mobbutton", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171122102701250", "description": "Toggle simple searchbar visibility", "caption": "{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} search" }, "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/template/topbar": { "created": "20171018115714311", "creator": "JD", "text": "\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$reveal state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" type="match" text="yes" default="yes" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$reveal state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbarchoice" type="match" text="simple">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/search" type="search" tag="input" placeholder={{$:/language/Search/Search}} class="jd-searchbar"/>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes"> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text={{$:/temp/search}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/search" text=""/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Clear and hide searchbar"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/search" text=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$scrollable fallthrough="no" class="results"> <$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/search"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]butfirst[]limit[1]]" emptyMessage=""" <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]" default={{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}}/>
<$reveal state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbarchoice" type="match" text="combined">
<$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/advancedsearch"> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input" placeholder={{$:/language/Search/Search}} class="jd-searchbar"/>
{{$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/delete}} {{$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/dropdown}} {{$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/export}} <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> {{$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/clear}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text="">
<$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" emptyMessage="""{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}""" variable="listItem"> <$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/advancedsearch"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]butfirst[]limit[1]]" emptyMessage=""" <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]" default={{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}}/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text="">

<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}/>"""> Filter search: <> <$list filter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text="">
<$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[is[system]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]"/>"""> System search: <> <$list filter="[is[system]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}sort[title]limit[250]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="match" text=""> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text="">
<$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[all[shadows]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]"/>"""> Shadows search: <> <$list filter="[all[shadows]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}sort[title]limit[250]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/template/topbar", "tags": "$:/tags/PageTemplate", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171122105806622" }, "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/template/bottombar": { "created": "20171115114644869", "creator": "JD", "text": "\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end \define config-mobtitle() $:/config/jd/mobbutton/visibility/$(listItem)$ \end
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TopLeftBar]!has[draft.of]!tag[$:/tags/jd/mobno]]"> <$transclude/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/PageControls]!has[draft.of]!tag[$:/tags/jd/mobno]]" variable="listItem"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/jd/mobbutton]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TopRightBar]!has[draft.of]!tag[$:/tags/jd/mobno]]"> <$transclude/>
", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/template/bottombar", "tags": "$:/tags/PageTemplate", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171121171507652" }, "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/stylesheet": { "created": "20171016123229521", "creator": "JD", "text": "/** CONFIG RADIO BUTTONS **/ .radbutton, .radbuttoff { display: inline-block; height: 12px; width: 12px; border: 2px solid <>; -webkit-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; -moz-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; -ms-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; -o-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; } .radbutton { background: <>; } .radbuttoff { background: <>; } .radbutton:hover, .radbuttoff:hover { border: 2px solid <>; background: <>; } .jd-bq { margin: 5px; padding: 5px; border: 1px solid <>; } .jd-bq, .radbutton, .radbuttoff { -webkit-border-radius: 6px; -moz-border-radius: 6px; -ms-border-radius: 6px; -o-border-radius: 6px; border-radius: 6px; } @media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .jd-bottombar, .jd-search { display: none; } } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-topbar { display: none !important; } .tc-tags-wrapper { margin: 5px 0 !important; } /** NOTIFICATIONS **/ .tc-notification { position: fixed; top: 60px !important; right: 10px !important; z-index: {{!!z-bar}} !important; } .tc-modal { top: 50px !important; left: 50px !important; right: 50px !important; } .tc-modal-body { max-height: calc(100vh - 200px) !important; } .tc-modal-wrapper, .tc-plugin-reload-warning { z-index: {{!!z-notif}} !important; } /** STORY RIVER **/ .tc-story-river { margin: 0 !important; margin-bottom: 50px !important; padding-top: 0 !important; } <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbarchoice" text="hide"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" text="yes"> .tc-story-river { margin-top: 50px !important; } <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" text="no"> .tc-story-river { margin-top: 0 !important; } <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbarchoice" text="hide"> .tc-story-river { margin-top: 0 !important; } .tc-tiddler-frame { margin-bottom: 2px !important; padding: 15px 10px; overflow: auto; } /** POPUPS AND DROPDOWNS INSIDE VIEW AREA **/ .tc-drop-down, .tc-block-dropdown { position: fixed !important; top: 50% !important; left: 50% !important; text-align: left; white-space: normal !important; max-height: calc(100% - 160px) !important; min-width: calc(100% - 90px) !important; max-width: calc(100% - 60px) !important; -webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; -moz-transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; -ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; -o-transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); -ms-box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); -o-box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); overflow: auto !important; z-index: {{!!z-dropdown}} !important; } .tc-menu-list-item { padding-left: 5px; text-indent: -5px; white-space: normal !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; -webkit-word-break: break-all !important; -moz-word-break: break-all !important; -ms-word-break: break-all !important; -o-word-break: break-all !important; word-break: break-all !important; } .tc-edit-type-dropdown { overflow: auto; } /** SCROLLBARS **/ body { -ms-overflow-style: -ms-autohiding-scrollbar; } div::-webkit-scrollbar, .tc-edit-type-dropdown::-webkit-scrollbar, .tc-block-dropdown::-webkit-scrollbar, .tc-drop-down::-webkit-scrollbar, .jd-search-results::-webkit-scrollbar, .tc-story-river::-webkit-scrollbar, .tc-sidebar-scrollable::-webkit-scrollbar { background: transparent; width: 0; } /** TOPBAR & BOTTOMBAR **/ .jd-bottombar { width: 100%; position: fixed; left: 0; background: <>; overflow: hidden; z-index: {{!!z-bar}}; } .jd-bottombar { bottom: 0; } /** SEARCH **/ .jd-search { z-index: {{!!z-search}}; } .jd-search-results { background: <>; width: 100%; max-height: calc(100% - 100px); position: fixed; top: 50px; left: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0 10px; overflow-y: auto; z-index: {{!!z-searchwrapper}}; } .jd-searchwrapper { background: <>; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 50px; z-index: {{!!z-searchwrapper}}; } .jd-searchbar { width: calc(100% - 20px); height: 30px; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; font-size: 16px !important; background: transparent !important; border: none; border-bottom: 2px solid<>; padding: 0 140px 0 10px; z-index: {{!!z-searchwrapper}}; margin: 10px; } .jd-search-buttons { width: 140px; position: fixed; top: 12px; right: 0; background: transparent; border: transparent; margin-right: 20px; text-align: right; vertical-align: middle; } .jd-search .jd-search-buttons { z-index: {{!!z-searchbuttons}}; } .jd-search-buttons .tc-popup-keep, .jd-search-buttons .tc-btn-invisible { font-size: 18px; background: transparent; border: transparent; cursor: pointer; } .jd-search-buttons .tc-btn-invisible { margin-left: 8px; } /** CONTROLS **/ .jd-title-controls { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin: 10px; } .jd-search-buttons button, .jd-title-controls button { fill: <>; font-size: 1.6em; -webkit-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; -moz-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; -ms-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; -o-transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; transition-duration: {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms; } .jd-search-buttons button:hover, .jd-title-controls button:hover { fill: <>; } .jd-bottombar .tc-page-controls { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin: 0 10px; } .tc-page-controls button { margin: 0 !important;} /** SIDEBAR LISTS **/ .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-site-title, .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-site-subtitle, .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-page-controls, .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-search { display: none; } .tc-sidebar-header { padding: 0 !important; } .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-tab-buttons { top: 50px; } <$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no"> .tc-sidebar-scrollable { background: <>; width: 100%; position: fixed; left: 0; z-index: {{!!z-sidebar}}; overflow: auto !important; } <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/sidebar" text="no"> .tc-sidebar-scrollable { display:none; } .tc-tab-set { overflow-y: auto !important; } <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbarchoice" text="hide"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" text="no"> .tc-sidebar-scrollable { top: 0 !important; height: calc(100% - 50px) !important; } <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbar" text="yes"> .tc-sidebar-scrollable { top: 50px !important; height: calc(100% - 100px) !important; } <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##searchbarchoice" text="hide"> .tc-sidebar-scrollable { top: 0 !important; height: calc(100% - 50px) !important; } /** SIDEBAR LISTS BUTTONS **/ .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-tab-buttons { margin: 10px; } .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-tab-content { margin: 10px !important; border: 0 !important; } /** ADJUSTABLE FONTS AND HEIGHTS **/ <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/config/config##fontsize" text="default"> .tc-tiddler-view-frame h2.tc-title, input.tc-titlebar.tc-edit-texteditor { font-size: {{!!font-title}} !important; } .tc-tiddler-view-frame .tc-subtitle { font-size: calc({{!!font-body}} - 4px) !important; } h1, h1 a { font-size: calc({{!!font-body}} + 6px) !important; } h2, h2 a { font-size: calc({{!!font-body}} + 4px) !important; } h3, h3 a { font-size: calc({{!!font-body}} + 2px) !important; } h4, a, li, table, input, textarea, select, .tc-tiddler-preview-preview p, .tc-tiddler-view-frame p, .tc-modal p, .tc-btn-text, .jd-search-results, .tc-tab-content, .tc-modal-header h3 { font-size: {{!!font-body}} !important; line-height: {{!!lineheight}} !important; } button.tc-btn-invisible.tc-remove-tag-button, .tc-tag-label.tc-btn-invisible { font-size: calc({{!!font-body}} - 4px) !important; } .tc-tab-buttons button, .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button, .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-tab-buttons button, .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button { font-size: {{!!font-tab-button}} !important; } .tc-btn-invisible, .tc-tiddler-controls button, .tc-tiddler-controls button svg, .tc-tiddler-controls button img, .tc-image-buttons, .tc-page-controls { font-size: {{!!font-button}} !important; } .tc-tiddler-controls button svg, .tc-tiddler-controls button img, .tc-image-buttons { height: {{!!font-button}} !important; width: {{!!font-button}} !important; } }", "z-searchbuttons": "4100", "z-search": "4000", "z-sidebar": "1500", "z-searchwrapper": "2500", "z-notif": "9000", "z-dropdown": "4000", "z-bar": "2000", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modifier": "JD", "modified": "20171122112814031", "lineheight": "{{$:/temp/jd/mob/font/lineheight}}", "font-title": "{{$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-title}}", "font-tab-button": "{{$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-tab-button}}", "font-button": "{{$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-button}}", "font-body": "{{$:/temp/jd/mob/font/font-body}}" } } }
author: JD
creator: JD
title: $:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp
name: mobvsimp
